mapper.sql: id, year_id, project_id, file_type_id, task_status, task_finish_date, project_status, file_path, file_name, auditor_id,bidder_id, release_status,type
mapper.insert: insert into mro_solution_status (id, year_id, project_id, file_type_id, task_status, task_finish_date, project_status, auditor_id, file_path, file_name, release_status, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yearId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{taskFinishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{auditorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.update:
update mro_solution_status
year_id = #{yearId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_type_id = #{fileTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
task_finish_date = #{taskFinishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
auditor_id = #{auditorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_status = #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_solution_status set year_id = #{yearId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_type_id = #{fileTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, task_finish_date = #{taskFinishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, auditor_id = #{auditorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_status = #{releaseStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select.if: SELECT ss.*, s.`name` file_type_name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` project_name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` year_name FROM mro_solution_status ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.year_id = s.id WHERE s.id =#{id} and s.type=#{type} ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.project_id = s.id ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.file_type_id = s.id

SELECT ss.*, s.`name` file_type_name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` year_name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` project_name FROM mro_solution_status ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.project_id = s.id WHERE s.id =#{id} and s.type=#{type} ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.year_id = s.id ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.file_type_id = s.id

SELECT ss.*, s.`name` project_Name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` year_name FROM ( SELECT ss.*, s.`name` file_type_name FROM mro_solution_status ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.file_type_id = s.id WHERE s.id =#{id} and s.type=#{type} ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.year_id = s.id ) ss INNER JOIN mro_solution s ON ss.project_id = s.id
